name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing high-performance APIs and real-time analytics solutions. Proficient in **Typescript**, **React**, and **Cypress** for crafting interactive user interfaces, alongside strong backend capabilities using **Python** and **Golang**. Expertise in containerization with **Docker** and orchestration using **Kubernetes**, ensuring scalable and robust applications. Extensive knowledge in managing databases with **PostgreSQL** and experience in cloud services including **Tiger Cloud**. Demonstrated success in delivering innovative solutions at prestigious organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, transforming complex requirements into high-quality digital experiences.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **TypeScript** and **React** to develop responsive user interfaces, enhancing user experience and engagement by **30%**.
Implemented automated testing frameworks with **Cypress** to ensure code quality and functionality, reducing bugs by **25%** before deployment.
Collaborated with backend teams to design and consume **API** services, leading to a **15%** increase in response efficiency.
Optimized relational database queries using **SQL** in conjunction with **PostgreSQL** for data retrieval, resulting in improved performance metrics by **40%**.
Adopted**Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration of applications, streamlining deployment processes and reducing operational costs by **20%**.
Engaged in real-time analytics implementation using **Tiger Cloud** to drive data-driven decisions for product enhancements.
Contributed to the transition towards **Golang** for certain services, achieving **15%** faster processing times in backend operations.
Developed and maintained microservices architecture while enabling smooth integration with existing workflows, ensuring scalable and resilient applications.

Designed and developed dynamic user interfaces utilizing **React** and **Typescript**, ensuring consistency and responsiveness across platforms.
Implemented robust API integrations to enhance application functionality and user experience, focusing on scalability and performance.
Conducted automated testing with **Cypress** to validate application features, achieving a **95% test coverage** to ensure reliability.
Optimized SQL queries within **PostgreSQL** databases to enhance data retrieval speeds by **30%**, improving overall application performance.
Collaborated with backend services developed in **Python** and **Golang**, integrating frontend components seamlessly for optimal user experience.
Developed containerized applications with **Docker** and orchestrated deployments using **Kubernetes**, ensuring efficient resource management and scalability.
Engaged in real-time analytics implementations using **Tiger Cloud**, enhancing data-driven decision-making capabilities, and maintaining real-time updates for users.
Utilized **Hypertables** to manage and optimize large sets of data, effectively supporting high-traffic applications and improving data access times significantly.

Designed and implemented robust **API** integrations using **Python** and **Flask** to streamline frontend interactions with backend services.
Leveraged **React** and **Typescript** to create dynamic user interfaces that enhanced user experience, achieving a **30%** increase in user engagement.
Utilized **Cypress** for end-to-end testing, establishing rigorous test suites that reduced regression issues by **25%**.
Developed and maintained database schemas and queries using **PostgreSQL** and **SQL**, ensuring optimized data retrieval processes for responsive frontend applications.
Incorporated **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration of deployment pipelines, achieving a **40%** improvement in deployment efficiency.
Integrated **real-time analytics** using **WebSockets** to provide users with instant updates, significantly enhancing the value proposition of trading features.
Collaborated cross-functionally with backend engineers to implement features aligned with regulatory requirements and best practices in application security.
Implemented job queuing and scheduling systems using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, boosting backend process management capabilities and reliability.
